pkgmetadata.longdescription: Comparing Correlations // Statistical tests for the comparison between two correlations based on either independent or dependent groups. Dependent correlations can either be overlapping or nonoverlapping. A web interface is available at http://comparingcorrelations.org. A plugin for 'RKWard' is included. 'RKWard' can be obtained freely from https://rkward.kde.org.
